title: Testing SNAPSHOT releases
text:
Testing SNAPSHOT releases

Whenever a story in devonfw-ide is completed by merging a PR,
our github actions will build a new SNAPSHOT release and on success deploy it to nexus on OSSRH.
You can therefore find the latest devonfw SNAPSHOT releases here.
Simply choose the latest SNAPSHOT version folder and then inside the *.tar.gz file for the latest version.
Once downloaded, you can proceed as with official releases (see install).


If you test the latest SNAPSHOT please also give feedback to bug or feature tickets to let us know if things are working or not.
Thanks for your testing, support and help to make devonfw better!
